title: Cant Log In
body: Recently updated the client and now I cant log it. I start the client, click play, and then it just doesnt load the log in screen. The client is still up, it's just blank inside.

replies.body: If I understand correctly, the client appears but it's a black screen.  Cases like this usually indicate a bad connection that's failing to download assets and remain stable.  I suggest using the #[connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) uide to go over each step and resolve this.  Let me know if you have any questions!
